outer.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Remove the tough outer leaves before cooking.
outer.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: further from the centre of something
outer.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: relating to objects, activities etc that are part of the world, as opposed to your own thoughts and feelings
outer.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: His inner conflict is related to struggles in the outer world.
